text.#text:
The issuance and sale of the Families of Fallen Heroes Semipostal Stamp under this section shall be

The Families of Fallen Heroes Semipostal Stamp shall be made available to the public for a period

50 percent of such amounts shall be transferred to the Tragedy Assistance Program for Survivors.
